Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Serape \Se*ra"pe\, n. [Sp. Amer. sarape.] A blanket or shawl worn as an outer garment by the Spanish Americans, as in Mexico. [1913 Webster]
serape n : a long brightly colored shawl; worn mainly by Mexican men [syn: {sarape}]
